Class MapDirection

java.lang.Object
  com.mapdigit.gis.MapObject
      com.mapdigit.gis.MapDirection

public final class MapDirection
extends MapObject

This class is used to store driving directions results

© Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.
